name: Pwnk
description:
PWNK is a new & epic way to interact with your streamer friends and your live audiences. There will be a collection of games that enables up to 1000 vs 1000 (Stream vs Stream) battles, and you will be able to lead your massive army of viewers to battle against another Streamer’s army in real-time. 2-3 new games will be added to the collection each month. All games are Free and easy to play.

New mini-games:

PWNK the game: It's like Pong but viewers can participate by pitching the ball.
Pwnk Snack: Can you guess which colored snack has the most area in the box?

Are you a streamer? You can play Pwnk with your viewers and with another streamer's chat.
Pwnk is very community-oriented and brings people together in existing streamer's communities.
